page.title: 10Stoke-by-Clare Charities
page.content: These charities date back to the 16th century but are still in force today for the benefit of the people of Stoke. The combined charities have an income of some 30 pounds a year.The Mary Barnes Charity however has an annual income of some 1000 pounds.She lived 300 years ago and bequeathed 225 pounds to apprentice poor children.This year the Charity Commissioners have changed the way in which the money may be used. There are now three ways in which the money may be awarded.All are to assist in the education of persons under the age of 25 who live in the parish.
